Blog.post: Minna-san Konichiwa...hihi..pplz..hmm..tok abt Mean gurlz yea?? tHiz is realli a nice show..yepxx..i swear..hahax..it is hilarious...hmm..indeed highli reccomended lahz..heehee..i watched thiz show by borrowing from moi fren...all the credits to her yea...she..is....TaDaa...Chrie Lew..she is moi childhood frenz...hmm..knew her from young..eh..dun mistaken..is from kindergarden onwards not baby..aiyah..we olwayz lykz to fight..argue wif each others de..yar..tok mean things abt each other...wakekeke..realli mean yea?? mean gurlz?? nopez..we are not as mean as them larz..yar..mean gurlz the gurlz are realli pretty..hmm..Regina is pretty but yar..broke her neck...ahahaha..a bit funni lor...Cady is actualli a nice gurl actualli!hmm... A NICEY NICEY SHOW...woohoo~heehee..u noe ?? haiz..thiz saturdae realli sad larz...i was realli veri veri stupid..tt dae orhz..got scolede by sir daniel..as i was stupid until cannot do the string tyiong...*cRy*..veri embarrased!! :(...yepx..thiz week i am reali veri veri unlucky...firstly being hit by the netball...by xiao wei!!!!! veri pain lehz...boohoo...hit until moi lipz *zhong*le..haiz..realli unlucki..yar..we oso had a tough training @taekwondo...yar..last of all..scolded by..sir..actualli not counted as scold ...but a bit sad...erm..okie..dun tok abt thiz le..tok sumthing else..yar..sowie..4 long time no write yea??heehee..forbidden to use computer...common test comin...so sad...too bad...aniwae..i still veri happi lahz..todae went to take neoprints wif moi best fren Chan Jia Min..hmm..a veri nice gurl...heehee..e pics..taken are veri funni..but veri good ..haxhax..a nice dae on mon...but not now until i write..after thiz i need to go and studi le..eh...not go and die arhz...(= . =)ll lolx..yepz..tt's the week i hav eva had...a veri unforgetable week...not b'coz tt it is a veri nice one...but a veri bad one...a veri memorable week...!!!!!kkz...i gtg le...hope thiz week would be beter 4 evryone bahz...*blehz* i gtg le...gdbye..frenz....pluz gdbyez...bad week...haxhax..jkjk.. oh yar...forget thiz.,.......(^.^)~* muaiz... a gdbuaiz kiss...muahahaha..jkjk...realli ...byebye!!

Moshi moshi...frenz..*blinkez* [miss mi] yea?? haxhax..jkjk..heehee..todae arhz..sumthing went haywire lehz...so scary!! u noe moi higher chinese teacher (miss low)got angry @ X person..then u noe wad..she tore his bk.. throw into e dustbin..actualli thiz iz not scari de..but when she scream @him and bangs the table and..and...her expression is realli scary..but yea..i think e person whu made her angry is realli bad lor..(=.=) so bad...[i h8te him] haxhax..okie yepx..todae grp 3 mahz...burmese hav been waithing 2 hear le yea/? lolx..*blehx*yepx..first person sae abt alicia mahz...she a nicey nicey gurl..lyks pink de..and veri concern abt her looks..heehee..todae hav borrowed CDs..from h3r..thx yea!!haxhax..nex comin is yinmei..she is a easi-going gurl..popular too!!plux yea..she kinda funni..de..well-liked by peepz..heehee..is realli a nice fren..and a gd helper of mrs ong lor...*smilez* Did u sae arihant?? he kinda ...talkative de..olwayz interrupts the lesson..wahahaha..he olwayz toks to zackary de..and todae yar..sae pranav (e idiotic guy) lykz mi and wanna kiss mi!!!!*voMit*i rather be lesbain then be his g.f...i think other gals agreed wif mi yea??hmmhhp..angry @arihant..want to make frenz wif him?? juz one word 4 u bah...BEWARE!!hahaha!!his neighbour is Zackary..mani gals saes he is gd-lookin de...hmmm..yepx..i oso think so bahz...*blehx*...still got mani gd-lookin one lahz...in our skool...ahahaha..go see lor..u r welcome de..he mahz..i dunnoe lahz..looks a bit blur lor..*blehx*..but yar..hav a lot of frenz...hmm..so gd yar..but he normalli tok to his frenz i can hear de..but when he toks to teachers i cant hear de..haha:X...okie let's skip e topic..yepx..u mean cheryl...heehee..a quiet quiet gal..she haz a twin sister lehz..cool yea??(^.

hihi..evione!!im bac..haha..todae mahz..nothing unusual happened around mi bahz..buti hav created a blog 4 moi class 1J le..hip hip hooray!!1J rawcks man!!haha!!Moi class mahz..is a veri noisy class..but veri liveli lahz..no kidding..??Hmmm..i will introduce to u peepz..a little more next time ..juz visit www.friendstar.blogspot.com...thiz blog u will noe more about them le...ahahaha..YepXx ..i promised to write abt grp 2 ...woah..a quite nice grp bah..okie start from e first..yea..it is Pranav..tt tupid tupid guy..quite hao lian de..tt's y i hate him a lot!!hhmmpphh..alwayz take moi things without permission is realli irritating lor..summore lyks 2 disturb gals..hate him 4eva..yar.dun tok abt him le..want 2 vomit liaoz..dun b'lieve..go 2 moi skool and look @him (properly)yuckz!!*VoMit*haha..no one sits wif him de..lol..Linda??oh..she veri fair-skinned one..nice orh?? she hav brown haircolour..veri nice lehz..hmm..i oso want!!hahaha..she mahz in TK band too~she a bit fierce lahz..sort of lyk 2 bulli small small gal lyk mi..haha..jkjk..she quite nice de..b'side her is shelveen..one of moi indian frenz...*frenz 4eva* haha ..all e credits 2 her to teach mi "suree de sailr" 2 sae bernice..aiyah..that;s mean zhutou..wakekeke..jkjk..she veri friendli de..but a bit quiet haha...quite happi to do wif her projects..*blehx*..u mean weijie..hmm..okok lahz..thiz guy..@the first year they sae he lyk jolin lehz..eh..nono..is Jolene hahaha..he..lyks to hangout wif Nikki..Zackary..darren those peepz de lor..he ..erm..i dunnoe him well cuz i dun tok to them b'fore..ahaha..his partner is Jonathan ..he quite qy=uiet de..i didnt hear him speak bfore..oohh..dunnoe..probabli..moi ears veri bad bahz...bhind him is Royce..can be called polar bear...muahahhahahaha..he is quite e pervertic too..olwayz plae cheat in Gunbound lehz,..use tele de..unfair!!! haha..he mahz,...lykz to tok to gurlz??dunnoe ..he quite funni de bahz..but lykz to laugh @others over their weak points ..ha!okie dun tok abt him le.. nex is Nikki..he in NCC(land)..erm..i suppose quite tough bahz..i dunnoe,..i didnt try bfore..but i dun want to try lahz..no way!!1hahah..he oso lykz to hang out wif Darren,Zackary,Weijie..a lot more..okie lahz..okok de..heard he lyk Munshi orh??sshh!!i sae onli heard but dunnoe lahz...(secret )dun eaj it out k??true frenz??heehee..next is Sarah..she is in Red cross...a helpful gurl..veri hardworking de..heehee...i cant be compared to her lor..she veri veri caring too..strives hard in her work lehz...clapclap..haha..it is veri good to do project wif her...okie Syjia..our class flower...haha..she veri pretty a lot of guyz lyk her...she is oso a caring gurl..tt time i sick arhz..she help mi a lot lahz..a nice gurl orhz/?? she mahz..veri clever de..tall tall de..chio chio too..haha..but was disappointed about losing her vice-chairman place..haiz...poor thing...okie..i think tt's all abt grp 2......comin soon..is grp 3.... haha(acting lyk the movie...)*blehx*...okie buaiz..moi frenz....i will write as much as possible de.....:)

moshi moshi...juz veri sianz arh ...gunbound spoil now lor..everytime lyk tt de..so sad ..*blehx* yepx..if u hav gunbound yea?? add mi k?? moi is cuppucino41 or oOsk8terboi....yepx..tt's all moi acc le..heehee.cant take much lahz..haha..todae stay bac in sch to do the maths project wif moi frenz...there are wei rong (netballer),bernice(red cross de),ah!! and sarah (red cross too!!) there are moi frenz,...they are realli good lor.. true frenz..haxhax..in charlotte's web learnt de..lolx..they mahz..veri humorous de..todae do project can laugh non-stop de...hmm..kinda feeling a bit strange sitting b'side them...lolx..(=.=)ll u noe arhz..actualli they are a lot of moi classmates de..next time one by one tell u peepz k...yepx..oso wont 4 get moi pri.skool frenz de...haha...but u peepz too orhz..oso muz remember mi ...if not arbish u peepz de wor!!*smilez* yepx..in class mahz...most popular gurlz??
